desc: Develop and communicate the club's design vision and strategy, aligning it with the organization's goals and objectives
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and marketing, to drive design excellence throughout the product development lifecycle
Expertise in Figma as the primary design design tool, using to create wireframes, mockups, prototypes, and design systems.
Developed a website on Wix to communicate recruit and maintain members up to date on events.
Collaborated in the design and distribution of monthly electronic newsletter for 70+ subscribers
Held office hours for UF students in Calc 1 and MATLAB
Created study guides for every exam an distributed to students
